personalInfo.name: Jung Gu
personalInfo.title: Full-Stack Developer | Software Engineer
personalInfo.summary: Full-Stack Developer specializing in JavaScript, TypeScript, and Python with experience in cloud technologies and modern web development. Proven track record in developing efficient web applications and implementing automated systems.

experience.description:
• Led full lifecycle migration from Virtual Machines to containerized architecture (Docker → Azure Container Apps Jobs) making deployments 5x faster while cutting costs by 80%.
• Built an automated shipment data pipeline with Azure Container Apps Jobs, reducing manual processing by 40% through scheduled containerized workflows.
• Engineered a high-availability API gateway (Azure API Management + Functions) that enabled real-time tracking across third-party partners, reducing integration errors.
• Collaborated with Stryker to enhance medical device tracking reliability, achieving 99.9% uptime and 100% data accuracy for 10k+ monthly transactions.

• Worked within an Agile (Scrum) team to deliver a high-performance TypeScript/React landing page, implementing lazy loading and component optimization to Increase consultation requests by 35%.
• Optimized website performance through code refactoring and modern development practices, ensuring cross-browser compatibility and mobile responsiveness.

• Developed client communication system integrating Mailchimp API for automated email workflows, reducing manual follow-ups by 30%.
• Optimized website performance by diagnosing issues via Google Analytics (e.g., bounce rates, exit pages) and implementing UI/SEO fixes that grew traffic 25% MoM.

education.description: The ability to write well designed, testable, efficient code by using industry-standard software development practices for front and back-end dynamic development.
Coursework in Business Management / No Degree

projects.name: Klickr Project
projects.description:
• Utilized Flask blueprints and SQLAlchemy to develop a Restful backend server with responsive API's and data pertaining to images, reviews, and tags for frontend client-side requests.
• Collaborated with a team of developers to produce a fully functional application by managing an efficient Git workflow of push/pull requests while implementing SCRUM principles.

projects.name: Jusbnb Project
projects.description:
• Designed and implemented efficient database relationships and Restful APIs using Sequelize, Node.js, Express, and integrated SQLite for optimized data storage and management.
• Implemented a booking component enabling seamless date reservation without conflicts, incorporating error validation functions and JavaScript event listeners for accurate selection.
